text: @narendramodi #Lockdown period to be utilized to check all with flu symptoms to identify #COVID19 cases. Even person with flu to remain home quarantined to avoid spread and thus minimize future cost of testing. 21 days is long enough. Further lockdown not an option, counterproductive.
